content: enamored by veronica ory welcome baby with this soft and cuddly crocheted blanket it s a simple one-row repeat with stripes that are always in style enamored yarn miss babs yowza 100% superwash merino wool 560 yd/8 oz 512 m/225 g skeins 1 skein in each of 3 colors shown in white peppercorn c1 blue savannah c2 and rock sparrow c3 or approximately 500 yards/457 meters of dk weight yarn in color 1 450 yards/410 meters in color 2 and 400 yards/365 meters in color 3 finished measurements abbreviations width 34 /85 cm length 36 /90 cm crochet notation us c color hook us g 4 0 mm or
